text: > Sports USC AD: Sarkisian fired for failing to meet school standards FILE - In this Nov. 16, 2013 file photo, Southern California athletic director Pat Haden, right, jumps into the arms of offensive coordinator Clay Helton after USC defeated Stanford in an NCAA college football game in Los Angeles. Helton will assume the USC helm as interim coach after Haden fired Steve Sarkisian Monday, Oct. 12, 2015. Helton was named interim coach Sunday, one day after Sarkisian was put on leave.(AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill, File)
